com.hazelcast.internal.partition.impl

Class PartitionReplicaManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.hazelcast.internal.partition.impl.PartitionReplicaManager

  • public class PartitionReplicaManager
extends Object
    Maintains the version values for the partition replicas and manages the replica-related operations for partitions

    • Method Detail

      • triggerPartitionReplicaSync

        public void triggerPartitionReplicaSync(int partitionId,
                                        int replicaIndex,
                                        long delayMillis)
        This method is called on a backup node (replica). Given all conditions are satisfied, this method initiates a replica sync operation and registers it to replicaSyncRequest. The operation is scheduled for a future execution if :
        • the delayMillis is greater than 0
        • if a migration is not allowed (during repartitioning or a node joining the cluster)
        • the partition is currently migrating
        • another sync request has already been sent
        • the maximum number of parallel synchronizations has already been reached
        Parameters:
        partitionId - the partition which is being synchronized
        replicaIndex - the index of the replica which is being synchronized
        delayMillis - the delay before the sync operation is sent
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the replica index is not between 0 and InternalPartition.MAX_REPLICA_COUNT

      • isPartitionReplicaVersionStale

        public boolean isPartitionReplicaVersionStale(int partitionId,

      • finalizeReplicaSync

        public void finalizeReplicaSync(int partitionId,
                                int replicaIndex,
                                long[] versions)
        Set the new replica versions for the partition with the partitionId and reset any ongoing replica synchronization request for this partition and replica index.
        Parameters:
        partitionId - the partition ID
        replicaIndex - the index of the replica
        versions - the new replica versions for the partition

      • clearReplicaSyncRequest

        public void clearReplicaSyncRequest(int partitionId,
                                    int replicaIndex)
        Resets the state of the replica synchronization request for the given partition and replica. This will cancel the scheduled synchronization, clear the ongoing sync flag and release a synchronization permit.
        Parameters:
        partitionId - the partition being synchronized
        replicaIndex - the index of the replica being synchronized

      • cancelReplicaSync

        public void cancelReplicaSync(int partitionId)
